header.title: Update OGame-Mod from v. 1.1.1 to 1.1.3
header.description: This file will help you, if you have installed the version 1.1.1 of OGame-Mod.

edit.find: // Begin OGame-Mod 'U_MMOGAME' => ($data['user_mmogame'] && $config['ogame_mmogame_show']) ? '' : '', // End OGame-Mod
